text: Looks expensive to live here,was there to pick up firewood from a cleared lot as they are still building new homes here.

name: Merrilyn Cook
text: New housing development that has nice houses. The only drawbacks are that it is pretty far away from town and there is still a lot of construction going on.

name: Chris Lee
text: Very nice

name: Patricia Hanner
text: Really good and practical.good service.

name: Suanne Nutter
text: Beautiful new homes

name: Terrance Macon
text: Great Neighborhood

name: PHA 4EVER
text: Nice looking area!

name: Luke Dunkling
text: I build house foundations there..

name: Flo sick
text: Worst place I ever lived !! Rats are uncontrollable rent is too high maintenance sucks and slow.. I’m over it !!

name: Jerry Mays
text: Manager and staff are very friendly. Nicely landscaped property too.

name: Tempest games
text:
Update:

1/ The A/C don't work in lorna place apartments and there's no management or emergency contact.
And i have been paying the place at the galleria apartment. It's super hot in my apartment and i have a baby

2/ The A/C went down again, how to contact the corporate?!

Update Aug 25 - 2020

The A/C don't work again it's been out since Friday Aug 21-2020 they said the compressor is bad so they need to replace it. I talked to the office they said it's going to be fixed today but they didn't show up at all.
I'm moving and I'm nit renew my lease. They lie and don't keep u updated.

name: Terrica Bell
text: At first this place was okay but honestly we rushed into it because we were expecting. The previous management wasn’t helpful at all. I don’t like how you have to split a water bill amongst residents, if you stay in a townhouse, which we didn’t know upon moving in. When I first moved in my mailbox didn’t have a door and they never fixed that. New management didn’t know but she did put in a request to get it fixed but we moved out before it did. The new manger Melinda is great, if she was Manager when we first moved in we may have considered staying another year. I believe things at the apartment will get way better with her.

name: Stephanie Davis
text: They working on getting better.

name: Tashiana Bentley
text: This place is horrible I will not recommend staying here.  Every single problem we have either it’s dealing with bugs , ceiling leak , dish washer leaving a bad odor smell. They will say someone coming by and nobody will show up. The last leasing manager was stealing people money the new leasing manager isn’t no better. They will not pick up the phone you have to walk down to the leasing office and majority of the time they will not even be there !  This is just all around a terrible experience since I moved here !

name: plainpeachy
text:
Horrible. Absolutely horrible. We live at lorna place and have to come here to pay our rent or see them in person. They also never answer their phones. Our refrigerator has been messed up for awhile and we've been trying to get them to come and fix it for over 2 weeks. I cant wait until my lease is up. The old management was much more attentive and would respond in less than a day to issues. This company has been nothing but demanding of us as tenants but cannot answer the phone or put in a maintenance request they said they would.

Edit: we talked to the front office on 7/22/20 and they said they would send someone out in 20 minutes to work on our fridge. We waited over 2 hours and no one showed, but they sure had someone leaf blowing around our building.  We also kept calling the office until they closed and surprise surprise, no one picked up.

Another edit: today, 7/24/20, no one has still come out to look at our fridge. We were told someone would come by in about an hour and we waited more than 2 hours, then called the office and no one picked up. So we went to the office close to 4pm and there was a sign on the door that said 'at lunch'. At 4pm. I cannot believe how unprofessional this complex is.

Do not stay anywhere this contour company owns.

name: Terrance Davis
text: Love the new direction that the new management team is taking with the property. Melinda is the BEST!

name: Kimberly Robinson
text: The Place at Galleria is the most problematic place I've ever lived in.I have only been here 1 month and is at my worse end with the new management. First, Mrs Teresa and Krysti- the property managers are awesome. However, The Place at Galleria has recently sold to another management for the second time in 1 month. Now that really speaks volume for this property. It is true concerning the pest and plumbing problems. Our current apartment in the 900 building floods all the time, such awful smell. Bless our new maintenance guy heart, he just walked into a trap house. He is very nice and immediately does his best to get the apartments back to live able conditions. Now we are literally forced to vacate our apartment and either downgrade to 1 bedroom apartment or a 3 bedroom townhome for more rent, when it’s not our fault that you didn’t keep your maintenance up on your building probably since the buildings were built. Then, to top the cake the new management is offering us $200 (a freaking slap in the face) to move. How irrational and greedy can you be??? Do yourself a favor and don’t come here to The Hood At Galleria. PS The 1 bedroom apartment have 8 people living in them and they take up all the parking.  View Less

name: Andrea Moreno
text: AVOID MOVING TO THIS PLACE!!! You will have roaches in your apartment 24/7 even after each “pest control”. You will get your car towed during daylight hours and the management team will not do anything for you. Try to keep yourself away from this nasty place.

name: Chad Kelley
text: Hope you dont like parking anywhere near your apartment

name: Trevian Spears
text: The worst apartment I've lived in Birmingham. The management is poor. Their customer service is horrible. I had roaches and gnats my whole stay even after they claim pest control stops by. Avoid at all costs!

name: Tippdby CASH
text: I moved here September 9th 2016. In the beginning the staff was nice they show me my apartment and it was spotless. However the very night i moved in I saw an abundance of roaches both dead and alive. I've called and had them spray every week I've lived here and it has not even slowed the problem, in fact it has made it worse. They blamed it on renting out to corporations and their employees (landscapers to be exact) were not keeping their units clean and that they had this problem in over five buildings. I've called the health department and now they are offering to break my lease with no refund and no 30-day notice. This place is absolutely horrible! Vesta management will not answer the phone and will only transfer you to the "general manager," which is always voicemail. Within the two months I have lived here I have been ripped off over $1500 and left homeless. Plus sewage here is RIDICULOUS. I was charged over $65 on a PARTIAL sewage and water bill, I do not plan to be here for the full one. Just a few weeks ago there was a home invasion. My neighbors are ALWAYS playing loud music and leaving dog poop all in the walkway. No parking so when I come home late at night after work I have to walk FOREVER to get to my doorstep. Did I mention there's trash everywhere? DO NOT MOVE HERE!!!!!!!!!!!!

name: Felicia McHenry
text: New owner poor management i left several messages only for my elderly neighbor to tell me the manager was calling him asking for me, trash pilled up for two weeks at a time, needless to say i will be moving

name: L. Taylor
text: I stayed here between 2010 and 2011, and I enjoyed it. It may be under new management now; however, during that particular year, the staff was great and I had no problems.

resp.text:
Hi Shanna!
Thank you for your kind words! We're delighted to hear that you've enjoyed your stay with us. If you need anything at all, please don't hesitate to reach out. Thank you, The Place at Galleria Team

name: Andrea Moreno
text: Stay away from this unit! Nasty apartments with Roaches.

name: Gabrielle Gardner
text: Everything is ok the rent is just to high for a one bedroom at first I was paying 634 then it went up to 735 because apparently they split the water bill with the whole unit so I was paying 94 close to a $100 just for water and I was barely there using it, I also don’t like how maintenance just come in your house without leaving a note saying they are coming or after they have been in the house.

resp.text: Hi Gabrielle, thank you for the kind words! We love receiving feedback, the good and the bad, so please don't hesitate to let us know if there is anything we can improve in the future. Thank you, The The Place at Galleria Team!

name: Hailey Meadows
text: This place is a JOKE!!! Roaches Roaches and more Roaches!! The people in the office are never there! They half way fix stuff!! It's old, and run down! It's very closed in. You get charged for other people's services.... it's a rip off!!! Don't sign with them!!! You'll be wasting your money!

name: Alexis Reedy
text: I’m self employed and they would not allow me to apply with my income although I exceed the monthly requirements and have proof of income.

name: traci rayford
text: I'm currently staying here at the Place at Galleria Located in Hoover, Alabama. I have expeience amp amount of bugs such as roaches. I was laying across my floor one nite, I had dozed off to sleep. I felt some tingling In my ear. So I flushes my ear with water. How about a baby roach came out of my ear..I called to the leasing office, Casey the leasing Manager said was sending the maintence man out to pest my apt. It helped a little, but I see more bugs. I do not recommend no one to live here..

name: Cristina pena
text: Great! Place to live! Serene environment! Great prices!

name: Sharon Calhoun
text: Very nice apartments

resp.text:
Hi Sharon!
Thanks for taking the time to leave us a review! We're delighted to hear you had a pleasant experience with us. Please let us know if there is anything we can do for you in the future!

name: Latasha Bell
text: I lived in these apts for two years, I had a okay experience....I will not recommend these apartments to my worst enemy..... Beware of roaches, more and more roaches!!! Pest control came once a month.... Even then that didn't resolve the issue!!!!!

name: Chris Womack
text: Love it

name: William Whitsett
text: Crowed

name: My'Rez Davis
text: Good quiet place to live

resp.text:
Hi My'Rez!
We are delighted to hear you are enjoying your experience at The Place at Galleria and with our team. Your experience is our first priority. On behalf of our entire team, thank you for the feedback. - The Place at Galleria Team

name: Richard D Crumpton
text: Nice

name: Jayne Wilson
text: Office personal were very unfriendly

name: William Whitsett
text: Crowed
